description: C: add Tobias Columbus's email used in Rietveld

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

On Sun, Aug 26, 2012 at 7:16 PM, <tobias.columbus@googlemail.com> wrote:
>
> I don't really mind, but if I had to decide I'd prefer the @gmail.com
> address.
>
the problem is: when you clpatch a CL, its author's email address (as used
in rietveld login)
must be present in CONTRIBUTORS.

if @gmail and @googlemail are indeed equivalent, i think changing
codereview.py
is more appropriate.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a95c69098e45 ***

C: add Tobias Columbus's email used in Rietveld

R=golang-dev, tobias.columbus, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6483058

for CL 6443151.

i wonder if user@googlemail.com is equivalent to user@gmail.com?
if it is, could we change the codereview.py to recognize this case?

On 2012/08/26 10:25:29, minux wrote:
> for CL 6443151.
> 
> i wonder if mailto:user@googlemail.com is equivalent to user@gmail.com?
> if it is, could we change the codereview.py to recognize this case?

These mails are equivalent since April this year. This oddity has its origin in a legal dispute in Germany. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gmail#Germany.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6483058/diff/2001/CONTRIBUTORS
File CONTRIBUTORS (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6483058/diff/2001/CONTRIBUTORS#newcode311
CONTRIBUTORS:311: Tobias Columbus <tobias.columbus@gmail.com> <tobias.columbus@googlemail.com>
I don't really mind, but if I had to decide I'd prefer the @gmail.com address.

On 2012/08/26 12:04:04, minux wrote:
> On Sun, Aug 26, 2012 at 7:16 PM, <mailto:tobias.columbus@googlemail.com> wrote:
> >
> > I don't really mind, but if I had to decide I'd prefer the @gmail.com
> > address.
> >
> the problem is: when you clpatch a CL, its author's email address (as used
> in rietveld login)
> must be present in CONTRIBUTORS.
> 
> if @gmail and @googlemail are indeed equivalent, i think changing
> codereview.py
> is more appropriate.

I was not aware of the clpatch problem. Thanks for clarification.
I think changing my email address in CONTRIBUTORS is a quick and easy solution and after all tobias.columbus@googlemail.com is my rietveld login while tobias.columbus@gmail.com is not.

LGTM

This is fine.  I wouldn't change codereview.py --- that's a bit subtle.


On Sun, Aug 26, 2012 at 3:23 AM, <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go/
>
>
> Description:
> C: add Tobias Columbus's mail used in Rietveld
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**6483058/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6483058/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M CONTRIBUTORS
>
>
> Index: CONTRIBUTORS
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/CONTRIBUTORS
> +++ b/CONTRIBUTORS
> @@ -308,7 +308,7 @@
>  Taru Karttunen <taruti@taruti.net>
>  Thomas Alan Copeland <talan.copeland@gmail.com>
>  Timo Savola <timo.savola@gmail.com>
> -Tobias Columbus <tobias.columbus@gmail.com>

> *com <tobias.columbus@googlemail.com>>
>  Tom Szymanski <tgs@google.com>
>  Tor Andersson <tor.andersson@gmail.com>
>  Trevor Strohman <trevor.strohman@gmail.com>
>

subject: code review 6483058: C: add Tobias Columbus's mail used in Rietveld
